basics.name: Youssef Hussein
basics.label: Graduate Research Assistant and Fellow
basics.summary: A graduate research assistant at University of Minnesota researching big data systems with a focus on big spatial data.

work.name: University of Minnesota - Twin Cities
work.summary: Conducting research in the area of Big Data Management and Systems Architecture focusing on SpatioTemporal Data. Supervised by Prof. Mohamed Mokbel

description: Developed a web portal for interactively querying raster data.
Presented findings to the scientific community.
Created an extensible system for trajectory operations using LLMs.
Designed a Python library for ease of use and accessibility.

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
